Dear Hagop,

 

I hope you are fine.

 

We are preparing the Budget 2026 these weeks.

Maybe you already know what inflation rate we should consider concerning insurances ?

 

Many thanks in advance for your help,

Kind regards,

 

 

Marion BELLEC

ID: CLIE38N_01
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: m bellec <m.bellec@christofle.com>
CC: Pauline Battini <p.battini@christofle.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-11 16:25
Subject: RE: Insurances premiums budget
--------------------------------------------------
Hi Marion,

Very sorry for the late reply.

For USA, BLS estimates for y/y property and casualty related premium inflation was reported at around 4.6%, published in July. I would expect similar insurance premium inflation to apply for Canada.

Also, for Europe and the rest of the territories, I would suggest to budget around a 5% increase as well. 

Best Regards,

Hagop
